resp = client.search(
    index="news",
    query={
        "match": {
            "custom_all": "elasticsearch"
        }
    },
    aggs={
        "tags": {
            "significant_text": {
                "field": "custom_all",
                "source_fields": [
                    "content",
                    "title"
                ]
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
